languages.text: Часовня построена из роскошных материалов, однако святое место выглядит полузаброшенным: вы не чувствуете запаха запаленных благовоний, не видите печатей чистоты на дверях и не слышите молитв — ни человеческих, ни записей, транслируемых воксом.

The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox-recordings.
languages.original_text: Часовня построена из роскошных материалов, однако святое место выглядит полузаброшенным: вы не чувствуете запаха запаленных благовоний, не видите печатей чистоты на дверях и не слышите молитв — ни человеческих, ни записей, транслируемых воксом.

traits.locale_text: The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox recordings.

The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox recordings.

The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox recordings.

The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox-recordings.

languages.text: 礼拝堂は高級な材料で建てられているが、神聖な場所にしては半ば打ち捨てられているようだ。空気には燃える香の臭いも漂わず、扉には浄化の紋章もなければ祈りの声もない…人間の声もヴォクス録音も聞こえない。
languages.original_text: The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox-recordings.

traits.locale_text: 礼拝堂は高級な材料で建てられているが、神聖な場所にしては半ば打ち捨てられているようだ。空気には燃える香の臭いも漂わず、扉には浄化の紋章もなければ祈りの声もない…人間の声もヴォクス録音も聞こえない。

languages.text: 这个小教堂由昂贵的建筑材料建成，但此刻却几乎被荒废了。空气中闻不到任何圣香的味道，门上没有任何神圣印记，也听不到祈祷的声音。不仅没有祈祷的人声，甚至连音阵录音都没有。
languages.original_text: The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox-recordings.

traits.locale_text: 这个小教堂由昂贵的建筑材料建成，但此刻却几乎被荒废了。空气中闻不到任何圣香的味道，门上没有任何神圣印记，也听不到祈祷的声音。不仅没有祈祷的人声，甚至连音阵录音都没有。

languages.text: La capilla está construida con materiales lujosos, pero el lugar santo parece medio abandonado: no hueles ningún incienso, no ves ningún sello de purificación en las puertas y no oyes ninguna oración, ni de voces humanas ni de vocos.
languages.original_text: The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox-recordings.

traits.locale_text: La capilla está construida con materiales lujosos, pero el lugar santo parece medio abandonado: no hueles ningún incienso, no ves ningún sello de purificación en las puertas y no oyes ninguna oración, ni de voces humanas ni de vocos.

languages.text: Die Kapelle besteht aus luxuriösen Baumaterialien, aber der heilige Ort wirkt nahezu verlassen: Es hängt kein Geruch von Räucherwerk in der Luft, du siehst keine Reinigungssiegel an den Türen, und du hörst keine Gebete – weder menschliche Stimmen noch Vox-Aufnahmen.
languages.original_text: The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox-recordings.

traits.locale_text: Die Kapelle besteht aus luxuriösen Baumaterialien, aber der heilige Ort wirkt nahezu verlassen: Es hängt kein Geruch von Räucherwerk in der Luft, du siehst keine Reinigungssiegel an den Türen, und du hörst keine Gebete – weder menschliche Stimmen noch Vox-Aufnahmen.

languages.text: Bien qu'ayant été construite avec des matériaux de luxe, cette chapelle semble à l'abandon. Vous ne sentez pas d'encens, ne voyez aucun sceau de purification sur les portes et n'entendez pas de prières ni même d'enregistrements-vox.
languages.original_text: The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox-recordings.

traits.locale_text: Bien qu'ayant été construite avec des matériaux de luxe, cette chapelle semble à l'abandon. Vous ne sentez pas d'encens, ne voyez aucun sceau de purification sur les portes et n'entendez pas de prières ni même d'enregistrements-vox.

languages.text: Şapel, lüks malzemelerden yapılmış olsa da bu kutsal yer yarı yarıya terk edilmiş gibi görünüyor. Yakılmış tütsü kokularını duyamıyor, kapılarda arınma sağlayan mühürler göremiyorsun, kulağına dua sesleri de gelmiyor. Ne insan sesi ne de voks kayıtları var.
languages.original_text: The chapel is built out of luxurious materials, but the holy place looks half-abandoned: you cannot smell any burnt incense in the air, you see no seals of cleansing on the doors, and you hear no prayers — no human voices or vox-recordings.

traits.locale_text: Şapel, lüks malzemelerden yapılmış olsa da bu kutsal yer yarı yarıya terk edilmiş gibi görünüyor. Yakılmış tütsü kokularını duyamıyor, kapılarda arınma sağlayan mühürler göremiyorsun, kulağına dua sesleri de gelmiyor. Ne insan sesi ne de voks kayıtları var.
